http.400: Sorry, the request was invalid. Please try again.
http.401: Please sign in to access this resource.
http.403: You don't have permission to access this resource.
http.404: Sorry, we couldn't find what you were looking for.
http.422: Sorry, we couldn't process the request.
http.500: Sorry, something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
http.default: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.

cors.not_allowed: Not allowed by CORS. Please check your request.

rate_limiter.too_many_requests: Too many requests, please try again later.
